name: stijl
description: Chrome extension showing all your code reviews in a single page.

scripts.build: browserify src/index.js -o extension/dashboard.js -t [ babelify --plugins [ transform-object-rest-spread ] --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.watch: watchify src/index.js -v -d -o extension/dashboard.js -t [ babelify --plugins [ transform-object-rest-spread ] --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.travis: npm run build && npm run lint

author: Shuhei Takahashi <takahashi.shuhei@gmail.com>
